game.name: Crowd City
game.description:
Are you an adventure freak? Join Crowd City and be prepared to board on a completely unique and adventurous journey. You have entered the arena where you have to face the other towns in a completely fierce battle crowd. It is up to you how fast you grab the attention of people across the city and crush your rivals with your matchless leadership skill. Your motive in this brand new and highly addictive 3D multiplayer adventure game is to be the biggest crowd in town. 
You have to play wisely to attract a good number of followers in the city while forming a rampaging mob. If you are struggling for domination, feel free to steal some from your opponents in the game. Get ready to put your ultimate running skill to challenge to dominate the city in this cool html5 runner. Begin your game managing a single character. Do whatever you can do to convert followers to your cause to improve your power. Try to move the character with neutral color and you will watch soon turning their color and becoming a member of your crowd. 
We are pretty sure that you have the skill to dominate the city and beat other players from across the world. The one who has the skill to control the largest number of people in the city by the end of the time limit will be the winner. Do you think that you are skilled enough to grab the attention of the maximum crowd before the time expires? Join this ultimate html5 runner puzzle and prove the world that you know how to rule as the champion of the city.
